subject: Guidance needed
msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I am new to the overwhelming number of testing tools now available and so wanted some help. I have a web service (using apache axis as soap engine
messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I am new to the overwhelming number of testing tools now available
and so wanted some help.

I have a web service (using apache axis as soap engine and websphere
as app server ). What tool should I use for unit testing the code of
my service (junit/cactus/jxweb..or something else?)
also, what would be a good tool for functional testing of the web
service ?

any help/guidance will be greatly appreciated,
thanks,
pd.
